ACV Auctions
Thank you for submitting your condition report for VIN# {!Condition_Report_Prescreen__c.Vin__c} for review to the CR review team.
{!Condition_Report_Prescreen__c.Vehicle_Information__c}
Please be advised that you will receive another email once the review has been completed and you are approved for launching the vehicle.
Thank You!
640 Ellicott St #321 Buffalo, NY 14203 www.acvauctions.com
